snippet: InfiLaw said on Wednesday that it was temporarily suspending its application to but the Charleston School of Law, which was supposed to be considered by a commission Thursday.
abstract: For-profit company InfiLaw says that it is temporarily suspending its application for approval to buy Charleston School of Law.
lead_paragraph: InfiLaw said on Wednesday that it was temporarily suspending its application to but the Charleston School of Law, which was supposed to be considered by a commission Thursday.

headline.main: Company Delays Bid to Buy Law School in South Carolina
headline.print_headline: Company Delays Bid to Buy Law School in South Carolina
